QuestData.Title: Gaining Even More Acceptance
QuestData.CompletionText: You've worked your way up through the Brotherhood's corporate hierarchy, $r. We have begun to look favorably upon you. Quite an accomplishment!$B$BIf you're interested in more work and earning more respect amongst us, listen up.$B$BWe can refine our fiery flux by adding a simple Dark Iron residue to the mix. This Dark Iron residue can be found in Blackrock Depths.$B$BBring me all the Dark Iron residue you find!
